26 #ifndef TILEDARRAY_TILE_OP_UNARY_WRAPPER_H__INCLUDED
27 #define TILEDARRAY_TILE_OP_UNARY_WRAPPER_H__INCLUDED

29 #include <TiledArray/permutation.h>
30 #include <TiledArray/tile_op/tile_interface.h>
31 #include <TiledArray/zero_tensor.h>

33 namespace TiledArray {
34 namespace detail {
35 
37 
82 template <typename Op>
83 class UnaryWrapper {
84  public:
85  typedef UnaryWrapper<Op> UnaryWrapper_;
86  typedef typename Op::argument_type argument_type;
87  typedef typename Op::result_type result_type;
88 
90  static constexpr bool is_consumable = Op::is_consumable;
91 
92  template <typename T>
93  static constexpr bool is_lazy_tile_v = is_lazy_tile<std::decay_t<T>>::value;
94 
95  template <typename T>
96  static constexpr bool is_array_tile_v = is_array_tile<std::decay_t<T>>::value;
97 
98  template <typename T>
99  static constexpr bool is_nonarray_lazy_tile_v =
100  is_lazy_tile_v<T> && !is_array_tile_v<T>;
101 
102  template <typename T>
103  using eval_t = typename eval_trait<std::decay_t<T>>::type;
104 
105  private:
106  Op op_;
107  Permutation perm_;
108 
109  public:
110  // Compiler generated functions
111  UnaryWrapper(const UnaryWrapper_&) = default;
112  UnaryWrapper(UnaryWrapper_&&) = default;
113  ~UnaryWrapper() = default;
114  UnaryWrapper_& operator=(const UnaryWrapper_&) = default;
115  UnaryWrapper_& operator=(UnaryWrapper_&&) = default;
116 
117  UnaryWrapper(const Op& op, const Permutation& perm) : op_(op), perm_(perm) {}
118 
119  UnaryWrapper(const Op& op) : op_(op), perm_() {}
120 
122 
124  const Permutation& permutation() const { return perm_; }
125 
127 
131  auto operator()(argument_type& arg) const {
132  return (perm_ ? op_(arg, perm_) : op_(arg));
133  }
134 
136 
140  auto operator()(const argument_type& arg) const {
141  return (perm_ ? op_(arg, perm_) : op_(arg));
142  }
143 
145 
152  template <typename A, std::enable_if_t<is_nonarray_lazy_tile_v<A>>* = nullptr>
153  auto operator()(A&& arg) const {
154  return (perm_ ? meta::invoke(op_, invoke_cast(std::forward<A>(arg)), perm_)
155  : meta::invoke(op_, invoke_cast(std::forward<A>(arg))));
156  }
157 
159 
165  template <typename A, std::enable_if_t<is_array_tile_v<A>>* = nullptr>
166  auto operator()(A&& arg) const {
167  auto cast_arg = invoke_cast(std::forward<A>(arg));
168  // TODO replace with generic lambda, replace cast_arg with
169  // std::move(cast_arg)
170  // NB using this generic lambda breaks TaskFn ...
171  // need to make TaskFn variadic and accepting callables, but this is
172  // a lot of MP
173  //
174  // auto op_consume = [this](auto&& arg) {
175  // return op_.consume(std::forward<decltype(arg)>(arg));
176  // };
177  auto op_consume = [this](eval_t<A>& arg) { return op_.consume(arg); };
178  return (perm_ ? meta::invoke(op_, std::move(cast_arg), perm_)
179  : (arg.is_consumable()
180  ? meta::invoke(op_consume, cast_arg)
181  : meta::invoke(op_, std::move(cast_arg))));
182  }
183 
185  template <typename A, std::enable_if_t<is_lazy_tile_v<A>>* = nullptr>
186  auto consume(A&& arg) const {
187  auto cast_arg = invoke_cast(std::forward<A>(arg));
188  // TODO replace with generic lambda, replace cast_arg with
189  // std::move(cast_arg)
190  // NB using this generic lambda breaks TaskFn ...
191  // need to make TaskFn variadic and accepting callables, but this is
192  // a lot of MP
193  //
194  // auto op_consume = [this](auto&& arg) {
195  // return op_.consume(std::forward<decltype(arg)>(arg));
196  // };
197  auto op_consume = [this](eval_t<A>& arg) { return op_.consume(arg); };
198  return (perm_ ? meta::invoke(op_, std::move(cast_arg), perm_)
199  : meta::invoke(op_consume, cast_arg));
200  }
201 
202  template <typename A, std::enable_if_t<!is_lazy_tile_v<A>>* = nullptr>
203  result_type consume(A&& arg) const {
204  static_assert(std::is_same<std::decay_t<A>, argument_type>::value,
205  "UnaryWrapper::consume(A&&): invalid argument type A");
206  return (perm_ ? op_(std::forward<A>(arg), perm_)
207  : op_.consume(std::forward<A>(arg)));
208  }
209 
210 }; // class UnaryWrapper
211 
212 } // namespace detail
213 } // namespace TiledArray
